description:
The one piece of gear that's more important than your bike, just got better, well, safer. Details like MIPS protection, extra head coverage and a flexible visor prove this helmet was designed by shredders for shredders.

  • MIPS-C2® technology (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. An inner shell sandwiched under the foam reduces the rotational torque on your skull
  • Lightweight in-mould construction fuses EPS to a polycarbonate shell to help protect you from impacts
  • Flexible adjustable visor keeps weather and low hanging branches off your face
  • Safe-T DUO fit system lets you adjust your fit quickly
  • Vertical adjustment is ponytail friendly
  • 17 vents let air flow through to keep you comfortable
name: MET Terranova MIPS Helmet - Unisex
